name: Cheese Garlic & Onion Biscuits
preparation: Preheat oven to 425° F. Line a Sheet Pan with a Sheep Pan Liner.
In a large bowl, whisk together flour, cheese, baking powder, garlic, onion, baking soda, and salt.
Add butter; using your fingertips, rub into mixture until it resembles coarse meal.
Pour in buttermilk; using a fork, stir until a ragged dough forms. Using your hands, gently knead a few times until dough comes together.
Using a 1⁄4 cup measure, drop biscuits onto pan, spacing 2” apart. Bake until deep golden, 15–18 min. Serve warm.
tips: In a Prep Bowl, melt 1⁄4 cup butter with 1 tbsp Rosemary Garlic Seasoning. Brush over warm biscuits.

products.name: Minced Garlic
summary: Full, bold, garlic flavour. No chopping required.

summary: Sweet flavour of lightly toasted onion.

products.name: Rosemary Garlic Seasoning
summary: Enjoy hearty, robust flavours on chicken, pork, lamb & grilled or roasted vegetables.
